summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3789 for the improvement of North 42nd Street, from Fremont Avenue to Greenwood Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains, under Ordinance No. 46675, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
